thread.title: Deem Announces Expansion Of Cloud And Mobile Network Through Partnership With Leading Ground Reservation Management Provider Limo Anywhere
thread.title_full: Deem Announces Expansion Of Cloud And Mobile Network Through Partnership With Leading Ground Reservation Management Provider Limo Anywhere - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Deem Announces Expansion Of Cloud And Mobile Network Through Partnership With Leading Ground Reservation Management Provider Limo Anywhere
text:
Deem
Bi-directional Integration Will Allow Limo Anywhere Customers to Send and Receive Reservations, Update Statuses and Close Out Rides via Deem Cloud and Mobile Network
MIAMI , Oct. 12, Deem , the leading Commerce-as-a-Service (CaaS) company, and Limo Anywhere, the industry's largest provider of cloud-based and mobile software solutions for the ground transportation industry, today announced an expansion of their existing partnership that will fully integrate Limo Anywhere's reservation management software for ground transportation companies into Deem's Cloud Network. The announcement was made at the Chauffeur Driven Show in Miami, FL.
Limo Anywhere provides reservation management software solutions to more than 4,000 chauffeured transportation companies worldwide. Under the terms of the partnership Deem and Limo Anywhere will establish bi-directional coding between their respective platforms, allowing Limo Anywhere's customers who sign up with Deem to accept and send affiliate reservations over Deem's Affiliate Connect network, the largest and most trusted network of chauffeured transportation companies globally, spanning more than 80 countries and 700 cities. Limo Anywhere customers on the Deem network will also be able to send and receive status updates, enter chauffeur information, communicate with the customer and close out rides via the Deem Cloud and Mobile Network.
"We've enjoyed a wonderful working relationship with Limo Anywhere for nearly four years during which time they have proven time and again to be one of the most forward-thinking companies in terms of maximizing revenue and fleet utilization for chauffeured transportation operators," said Patrick Grady , Founder and CEO of Deem. "By integrating with Deem's Car Service Cloud Network, Limo Anywhere is again proving themselves to be a trusted partner to the industry, ensuring that their customers have the best technology solutions available to manage their fleets and drivers."
Since Deem announced a groundbreaking strategic alliance with the National Limousine Association (NLA) earlier this year, scores of leading operators, including global leaders such as Carey International, Music Express, Pure Luxury, EmpireCLS and Flyte Tyme have signed agreements with Deem for its new Car Service Cloud Network and Mobile application.
"Working with the chauffeured transportation industry on a daily basis, we have a unique understanding of both the need for the Deem Cloud Network as well as the excitement for it within the operator community," said Mark Gentry , President of Limo Anywhere. "We remain deeply committed to providing our customers with the best technology solutions available and our bidirectional integration with Deem will help our customers grow their businesses, increase customer loyalty and maximize revenue and fleet utilization."
Companies can manage their corporate chauffeured transportation programs by using Deem Car Service as a standalone application or pairing it with Deem Travel, Deem Expense or the complete Deem suite to unlock the full savings potential of spend and expense management on the Deem platform. By combining user preferences, corporate policies and the negotiated rates between corporations and their preferred operators, all in a consumer-grade cloud and mobile experience, Deem Car Service will enable the perfect transaction for all stakeholders. In addition, users can create both business and personal profiles and seamlessly navigate between each to book advanced and real-time reservations for both business and leisure trips.
About Limo Anywhere
Limo Anywhere provides the industry's leading software solution for more than 4,000 limousine and black car operators, helping to reduce operational costs and drive profitable growth. The company's integrated, cloud-based platform provides operators with end-to-end capabilities for reservations, account management, dispatch, credit card processing, flight tracking and financial management, and facilitates over 10 million rides annually.
About Deem
Deem is a leading Commerce-as-a-Service (CaaS) company that connects a large and diverse ecosystem of more than 34,000 customers, 100,000 merchants, 11 million unique products and services and 40 channel partners across a one-of-a-kind business commerce network, enabling them to lower costs, increase revenue and deepen customer loyalty. Deem is backed by leading mutual fund and private equity investors. For more information visit www.deem.com .
